target.description: Calculate the number of permutations of a multiset given the counts of each distinct item.
target.name: calculate_permutations_multiset

target.code:
from sympy import Rational

def calculate_expected_rolls(days):
    E = Rational(6, 5)
    return days * E
target.description: Calculate the expected number of times a die will be rolled over a certain number of days given specific rolling rules.
target.name: calculate_expected_rolls

target.description: Count arrangements of objects with given conditions and categories.
target.name: count_arrangements_with_conditions

target.code:
from sympy import Rational

def calculate_expected_dice_rolls(year_days):
    E = Rational(6, 5)
    return year_days * E
target.description: Calculate the expected number of times a die will be rolled given specific rules about rolling and outcomes.
target.name: calculate_expected_dice_rolls

target.description: Calculate permutations of a multiset given counts of distinct items.
target.name: count_permutations_multiset

target.description: Calculate the number of combinations of choosing k items from n items.
target.name: calculate_combinations

target.description: Calculate the number of permutations of n items taken k at a time.
target.name: calculate_permutations

target.code:
from sympy import Rational

def expected_rolls_die(days):
    E = Rational(6, 5)
    return days * E
target.description: Calculate the expected number of times a die will be rolled given the specific rules about rolling.
